title: T206 For sale SL Hindu and some beauties.
author: piedmont150

posts.post_title: T206 For sale SL Hindu and some beauties.
posts.post_content:
Retooling my collection a bit I am selling the  following 206s.  All are priced including confirmed shipping. Paypal Payment Owed preferred or cash. I have scans waiting to go for all.

Revelle_Hindu SGC 20  400.00 nice centering.  SOLD
Pattee SGC Auth was in a PSA4 holder, A real beauty SC 150 30 65.00
Overall Portrait SGC 60 Fantastic color, SC 150 30  100.00 SOLD
Donovan Portrait SGC 40 P150, Nice for the grade 40.00
Flanagan SGC 70 Piedmont 350  card looks every bit a NM off center with part of another piedmont on back, stunning card.  140.00
Dougherty Portrait SGC 60 Sovereign 350 Well centered and clean 110.00  SOLD
Irv Young PSA 5 low pop here, P350 90.00  SOLD
Schulte Front view PSA 4 Sovereign 150 Great color 200.00   SOLD

Its great to share these on this forum I've had many pleasant transactions lately with several members. 
Thanks
PM sent to you Doug. Thank you.
Bump for sold cards and price reduction..
hi, sent an email last night asking for scans of several cards. one is still available (Donovan). Thanks-Steve
Bump.. No one looking for a Southern League Hindu? Revelle and a few others still available..
Doug, Revelle is a great value! Tough SL'er and tough back.....
Revelle Sold..Flanagan, Donovan and Pattee to head to ebay tonight if not sold..
